name: Merlion
des: The Merlion is the official mascot of Singapore. It is depicted as a mythical creature with the head of a lion and the body of a fish.

name: Asian Civilisations Museum
des: The Asian Civilisations Museum (ACM) is an institution which forms a part of the four museums in Singapore.

name: Clarke Quay
des: Clarke Quay is a historical riverside in Singapore situated around the Singapore River Planning Area.

name: Fort Canning Park
des: Fort Canning Park, an iconic hilltop landmark has witnessed many of Singapore's historical milestones.

name: Orchard Road
des: Orchard Road is a whole street that's almost entirely dedicated to shopping.

name: Singapore Flyer
des: The Singapore Flyer is an observation wheel at the Downtown Core district of Singapore.

name: Marina Bay Sands
des: Marina Bay Sands is an integrated resort with a  retail mall, as well as convention facilities and entertainment venues.

name: Gardens By The Bay
des: Gardens by the Bay is home to a diverse collection of over 1.5 million plants.

name: Chinatown
des: Chinatown is a subzone and ethnic enclave located within the Outram district in the Central Area of Singapore.
